summary: This is a letter from FedEx Express Legal Department responding to a subpoena request from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding FEC File #35777 and Grand Jury case 07-103(WEI13). It provides business records on CD in PDF and Excel format related to shipments, with limitations on delivery records searches beyond 25 months.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: Recipient of the subpoena response letter from FedEx Express regarding FEC File #35777 and Grand Jury case 07-103(WEI13).

events.title: FedEx Subpoena Response Submission
events.description: FedEx Express Legal Department submits business records on CD in response to a subpoena from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding FEC File #35777 and Grand Jury case 07-103(WEI13).

locations: 3620 Haas Cross Road Building 8, 3rd Floor, Memphis, IN 38125
500 S. Australian Avenue, Suite 400, West Palm Beach, FL 33401-6235
keyFacts: FedEx Express responded to a subpoena from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding FEC File #35777 and Grand Jury case 07-103(WEI13).
The response included a CD with invoices in PDF format and an Excel spreadsheet containing compiled business records.
Delivery records were only available for the past 25 months; searches beyond that required manual processes.
The document indicates an ongoing grand jury investigation (07-103(WEI13)) in February 2008 related to financial/business records.
The correspondence shows law enforcement using subpoena power to obtain shipping records from FedEx as part of an investigation.
